org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.video

Class PersonLinker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.video.PersonLinker

  • public class PersonLinker
extends Object
    Person linker takes a video and makes links between the various depictions of the same person by using a face recognition engine for face verification.

    There are various challenges associated with doing this. For example, how much training is needed? Currently the amount of training is determined by the user's settings.

    The distance threshold that determines whether a person is the same person or not is determined by the user's settings, and is fed through the to annotator that is instantiated.

    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • processFrame

        public void processFrame(MBFImage frame,
                         Timecode timecode)
        Process the given video frame. The timecode can be null, if the frame's timecode is not known, but the RDF will not be output for the frame's timecode.
        Parameters:
        frame - The frame
        timecode - The frame's timecode

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the state of the person linker. Call this prior to running a new video through the linker. This will remove all the triples from a previous run.
